row.process:
:SET &SOURCEDIR# = "&LOGSRV#/COGNOS/AK-Cognos" :IF &IDT# = "P" : SET &BUCKET# = "bucket-production-landing-athora-irl" : SET &ARN# = "arn:aws:sns:eu-west-1:213502151711:topic-production-extract-arcsim" :ELSE : SET &BUCKET# = "bucket-test-landing-athora-irl" : SET &ARN# = "arn:aws:sns:eu-west-1:302601591292:topic-test-extract-arcsim" :ENDIF :SET &S3TARGET# = "s3://&BUCKET#/ARCSim/Assets/&TIMESTAMP_AM#/ --profile &BUCKET#-COGNOS"
!Warten bis Cognos Reports erstellt sind :WAIT 600
!Upload der einzelnen Cognos Reports echo "File to upload: $(ls -tr &SOURCEDIR#/elwms_migstat_190204-de-de_*csv |tail -1)" aws s3 cp $(ls -tr &SOURCEDIR#/elwms_migstat_190204-de-de_*csv |tail -1) &S3TARGET# if [ $? -ne 0 ]; then echo "##MESSAGE## elwms_migstat_190204 upload fehlgeschlagen!" echo "##CODE## 3002" exit 3 fi echo "File to upload: $(ls -tr &SOURCEDIR#/elwms_ArcSim_190204*csv |tail -1)" aws s3 cp $(ls -tr &SOURCEDIR#/elwms_ArcSim_190204*csv |tail -1) &S3TARGET# if [ $? -ne 0 ]; then echo "##MESSAGE## elwms_ArcSim_190204 upload fehlgeschlagen!" echo "##CODE## 3002" exit 3 fi echo "File to upload: $(ls -tr &SOURCEDIR#/elwms-komplett_zzr*csv |tail -1)" aws s3 cp $(ls -tr &SOURCEDIR#/elwms-komplett_zzr*csv |tail -1) &S3TARGET# if [ $? -ne 0 ]; then echo "##MESSAGE## elwms-komplett_zzr upload fehlgeschlagen!" echo "##CODE## 3002" exit 3 fi echo "File to upload: &SOURCEDIR#/EV Datenentnahme-de.csv" aws s3 cp "&SOURCEDIR#/EV Datenentnahme-de.csv" &S3TARGET# if [ $? -ne 0 ]; then echo "##MESSAGE## EV Datenentnahme-de.csv upload fehlgeschlagen!" echo "##CODE## 3002" exit 3 fi echo "File to upload: &SOURCEDIR#/EV Datenentnahme KSV-de.csv" aws s3 cp "&SOURCEDIR#/EV Datenentnahme KSV-de.csv" &S3TARGET# if [ $? -ne 0 ]; then echo "##MESSAGE## EV Datenentnahme KSV-de.csv upload fehlgeschlagen!" echo "##CODE## 3002" exit 3 fi
echo "********************************" echo "Summary of all uploaded files:" ls -tr &SOURCEDIR#/elwms_migstat_190204-de-de_*csv |tail -1 ls -tr &SOURCEDIR#/elwms_ArcSim_190204*csv |tail -1 ls -tr &SOURCEDIR#/elwms-komplett_zzr*csv |tail -1 ls "&SOURCEDIR#/EV Datenentnahme KSV-de.csv" ls "&SOURCEDIR#/EV Datenentnahme KSV-de.csv" echo "********************************"
!Erfolgsmeldung aws sns publish --topic-arn &ARN# --message "{\"batch\": \"&TIMESTAMP_AM#\",\"period\":\"default\"}" --profile &BUCKET#-COGNOS if [ $? -ne 0 ]; then echo "##MESSAGE## Sending success message failed!" echo "##CODE## 3002" exit 3 fi
